document_data.name: Arumn Gardpeck
document_data.mainbody: '''Arumn Gardpeck''' was the owner of the tavern called [[The Cutlass]] in [[Luskan]]. He took in the famed barbarian [[Wulfgar]] when he was battling with his personal demons after being imprisoned by the [[balor]] [[Errtu]].<ref>
document_data.Relationships: Arumn Gardpeck was familiar with [[Boswell Peddywinkle]], as he passed Luskan quite often on his trade routes.<ref>
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]] Arumn was a barkeep at the Cutlass in Luskan. He posted a notice on the Cutlass' door about a caravan guard job, heading to [[Targos]], [[Icewind Dale]].<ref>
